segments.text: Hi Mike , how are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kara , would you be interested in going to dinner again this Friday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mike , I had a good time too , but I am getting ready to move back to the east coast , so I think I shouldn't get too involved right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we could just go out as friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right now , I think I need to really focus on matters at home , but thanks for a nice evening .
segments.speaker: S2
